content.question: Which of the following occurred in Russia and most likely caused the change in the data from 2012 to 2014 ?

choices.label: A new dominant party came to power in Russia.
The economy of Russia suffered a significant decline because of a currency devaluation.
Russian nationalism increased due to relations with neighboring countries.
A prominent corruption trial resulted in the conviction of a top government official.

content.answer: Russian nationalism increased due to relations with neighboring countries.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
